signifie que vous pouvez nous demander: means that you can ask us at any time to tell you whether we are processing personal data about you and, if so, to tell you what personal data is concerned and the characteristics of the processing or processing carried out.

Au sein de YVEA, et au regard de chaque: Within YVEA, and with regard to each processing purpose, the personal data concerning you is collected, processed and stored by the authorized personnel of YVEA, only within the framework of their respective skills, and in particular by the customer service, the marketing department and the IT department.
Au sens de la réglementation applicable: For the purposes of the applicable personal data regulations, YVEA is therefore the data controller.
Ces droits s'exercent dans les condition: These rights are exercised in the conditions set by the applicable regulations.
L'ensemble des données personnelles coll: All personal data collected on this website are processed under the responsibility of the company YVEA, SASU with a share capital of 1000 €, registered with the Paris Trade and Companies Register under number 914285259, and having its registered office at 27 Rue du Chemin Vert, 75011 PARIS, France.
La limitation du traitement signifie que: The limitation of the processing means that the processing of your personal data will then be understood as the sole storage of your corresponding personal data. We will then no longer carry out any other operation on the personal data concerned.
Le traitement de vos données personnelle: The processing of your personal data in order to send you our newsletter is, on the other hand, based solely on your consent to receive our newsletter, which you can withdraw at any time. If you do not consent to the sending of the newsletter, please note that this will not prevent you from creating your customer account and placing orders on our website.

The processing of your personal data is carried out in a pre-contractual contact approach, this processing is based on your consent to be contacted in order to exchange on our offers and obtain a quote. You can withdraw this consent at any time and request that we delete your information and stop contacting you.
Lorsque de tels transferts existent, nou: When such transfers exist, we ensure that these transfers of personal data are framed in accordance with the applicable regulations in order to ensure an adequate level of data protection, either by a decision of adequacy of the European Commission, or by legal instruments such as data transfer contracts incorporating the European Commission's Standard Contractual Clauses.
Lorsque nous n'avons plus besoin de vos: When we no longer need your personal data for the purposes of processing but you still need them for the establishment, exercise or defence of legal rights;
Lorsque nous traitons vos données person: When we process your personal data on the basis of your consent, you also have the option of withdrawing your consent at any time by contacting the addresses indicated in the section 'How to contact us' or by clicking on the unsubscribe link in each of our communications.
Lorsque vous vous êtes opposé au traitem: When you have objected to the processing of your personal data and you wish to limit the processing for the duration that allows us to verify whether the legitimate reason you invoke is justified.
Nous ne partageons pas les données perso: We do not share personal data with other companies, organizations and individuals, unless one of the following circumstances applies:
Nous vous demandons de bien vouloir lire: We ask you to please read this privacy policy carefully to understand how your personal data is collected, processed and stored when you use the YVEA website, accessible via the URL https://yvea.io.
Ou par courrier postal à 27 RUE DU CHEMI: Or by post to 27 RUE DU CHEMIN VERT, 75011 PARIS, France.
Pour toute demande concernant les destin: For any request concerning the recipients and transfers of data that we make outside the European Union, please contact us at the addresses indicated in the section « How to contact us » below.
Publier et gérer vos avis et/ou commenta: Publish and manage your reviews and/or comments left on the website
Répondre à votre demande de contact effe: Respond to your contact request made from our website
Si vous avez des questions, des commenta: If you have any questions, comments or suggestions, please contact us by visiting the contact us page or by submitting them to
Si vous n'êtes pas satisfait de la répon: If you are not satisfied with the response provided by YVEA to a request to exercise rights in accordance with Article 5 above or if you wish to report a breach of the applicable regulations on data protection, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the CNIL by post (CNIL - 3 Place de Fontenoy - TSA 80715 - 75334 PARIS CEDEX 07) or on its website (www.cnil.fr), or with the data protection authority of the country in which you usually reside or work.
Toute modification substantielle de la p: Any substantial modification of the privacy policy will be notified to you by e-mail when you have communicated a valid e-mail address and will be published on the website. We recommend that you regularly read this privacy policy in order to have a perfect knowledge of our commitments in terms of security and protection of your personal data.
Toutefois, le retrait de votre consentem: However, the withdrawal of your consent does not affect the validity of the processing carried out before this withdrawal.
Vos données personnelles doivent être ef: Your personal data must be deleted to comply with a legal obligation which is provided for either by European Union law or by French law.
Vos données personnelles seront hébergée: Vos données personnelles seront hébergées au sein des infrastructures d'hébergement de notre hébergeur, HOSTINGER, situé en Chypre.
Vos données personnelles sont traitées s: Your personal data is processed on the basis of your consent, you wish to withdraw this consent, and there is no other legal basis that may justify the processing; You have objected to the processing of your personal data and you therefore wish them to be deleted; Your personal data has been processed unlawfully;
Vous adresser notre newsletter, dans le: Send you our newsletter, if you are registered for it
Vous disposez d'un droit d'accès, de rec: You have the right to access, rectify, delete, limit, oppose the processing of your personal data as well as the right to define directives regarding the fate of your data after your death and the right to portability of your personal data.
Vous pouvez nous contacter à tout moment: You can contact us at any time at the addresses indicated in the section ‘'How to contact us' below in order to exercise your rights regarding personal data in the conditions set by the applicable regulations. You must indicate which right you intend to exercise as well as all the necessary details so that we can respond to your request.
YVEA (« YVEA », « notre », « nous » et «: YVEA (« YVEA », « our », « we » and « us ») and our partners respect your privacy.
YVEA peut utiliser vos données personnel: YVEA may use your personal data for the following purposes:
YVEA peut également divulguer vos inform: YVEA may also disclose your information to companies that provide services to us or on our behalf. These service providers include companies that provide computer services such as our host or our email provider, delivery services for our products, or that provide marketing activities on our behalf. These service providers may use your information only for the purpose of providing you with services on behalf of YVEA.
YVEA s'assurera de la légalité de tout p: YVEA will ensure the legality of any sharing of personal data via data processing clauses with the companies with which your personal data is shared, requiring them to comply with this privacy policy and to take appropriate security and confidentiality measures when processing personal data.
YVEA se réserve le droit à tout moment d: YVEA reserves the right at any time to modify or update, in whole or in part, this privacy policy, due to the modification of the applicable regulations on the protection of personal data or the processing of data carried out.
YVEA, peut partager vos informations com: YVEA, may share your information as required by law and regulation, to resolve legal disputes, or as required by judicial or administrative authorities under the law.
après avoir obtenu votre consentement, Y: after obtaining your consent, YVEA will share the information you have authorized with the third parties or specific categories of third parties entered on the occasion of the collection of your consent.
droit de définir des directives relative: right to define directives regarding the fate of your data after your death
signifie que vous pouvez demander d'effa: means that you can request the deletion of your personal data in particular when: Their retention is no longer necessary in relation to the purposes for which they were collected;
signifie que vous pouvez nous demander d: means that you can ask us to limit the processing of your personal data: When you dispute the accuracy of your personal data for a period of time that allows us to verify the accuracy of your personal data; When, following a processing established as non-compliant, you prefer the limitation of the processing to the complete deletion of your personal data;
signifie que vous pouvez nous demander l: means that you can ask us to rectify your personal data when it is inaccurate. You can also request that your personal data, as soon as it is incomplete, be completed to the extent that this is relevant to the purpose of the processing in question.
signifie que vous pouvez nous demander,: means that you can ask us, in the conditions set by the applicable regulations, to receive your personal data in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format, and to transmit them to you, or to ask us to transmit them directly to a third party of your choice when this is legally and technically possible.
signifie que vous pouvez vous opposer au: means that you can object to the processing of your personal data, when this processing is based on the pursuit of the legitimate interest of YVEA. The right of opposition is exercised subject to the justification of a legitimate reason relating to your particular situation. We will then cease the processing in question unless there are legitimate and compelling reasons for continuing it in accordance with the applicable regulations.
vous permet de faire connaître vos instr: allows you to make known your instructions concerning the retention, deletion and communication of your personal data after your death.
